description: Simple calculator with basic operations - ATDD/TDD beginner example
feature: Calculator with addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division
acceptanceCriteria: Given two numbers, when added, then correct sum is returned
Given two numbers, when subtracted, then correct difference is returned
Given two numbers, when multiplied, then correct product is returned
Given two numbers, when divided, then correct quotient is returned
Given division by zero, when attempted, then error is thrown with appropriate message
Given non-numeric inputs, when operation attempted, then error is thrown
notes: Simple example to learn ATDD/TDD basics
Clear acceptance criteria for straightforward functionality
TDD cycle will be very explicit and easy to follow
Good starting point for TDD newcomers
